metadata.title: CVE-2019-6784 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in GitLab Community and Enterprise Edition before11.5.8, 11.6.x before 11.6.6, and 11.7.x before 11.7.1. It allows XSS(issue 1 of 2). Markdown fields contain a lack of input validation andoutput encoding when processing KaTeX that results in a persistent XSS.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
